func mark[F: TsuField or WaterField](nazo: NazoPuyo[F]; endStepIndex = -1): MarkResult {.
    inline, noinit, ...raises: [].}
Marks the steps in the Nazo Puyo. If endStepIndex is negative, all steps are used. This function requires that the field is settled.

Returns the Nazo Puyo converted from the URI query.
